la-petite-koki.title: La petite Koki
la-petite-koki.heroDescription: This Voilà Vélo Fruité package offers an exciting and convenient way to blend fun with health at your next event.

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package includes a kid-friendly blender bike, allowing participants to pedal to create their smoothies, making it a fun and interactive activity for all ages. The La petite Koki package provides the essentials you need for a streamlined blending experience, ensuring your guests leave with a memorable impression.
includes: 25-50 delicious smoothies depending on chosen option

options.title: Small Party Option
options.idealFor: Perfect for small birthday parties (10-15 children) or intimate events.

options.title: Big Celebration Option
options.idealFor: Ideal for large parties (20-30 children), kindergarten graduations or family festivals.

pop-solo.title: Pop Solo
pop-solo.tagline: A guaranteed hit with teens, adults, and families!
pop-solo.heroDescription: Perfect for school events, office parties, or any festive gathering focused on health and fun!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package includes an adult-sized blender bike, allowing participants to create their fresh smoothies while exercising. A perfect experience that combines fun, health, and social interaction.
includes: Festive atmosphere with music and good vibes

options.title: Standard Option
options.idealFor: Perfect for small events and intimate gatherings.

options.title: Premium Option
options.idealFor: Ideal for medium events and corporate celebrations.

double-fun.title: Double Fun
double-fun.heroDescription: Perfect for community festivals, brand activations, fundraisers, corporate parties and more!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package includes two adult-sized blender bikes, allowing for a larger-scale interactive experience. Perfect for creating a dynamic crowd atmosphere and engaging more participants simultaneously.
includes: Complete setup with tables and signage
Customization with your brand, balloons, and decorations

options.title: Festival Option
options.idealFor: Perfect for community events and local festivals.

options.title: Activation Option
options.idealFor: Ideal for brand activations and corporate events.

options.title: Large-Scale Option
options.idealFor: Perfect for large festivals and major events.

ready-set-blend.title: Ready Set Blend
ready-set-blend.tagline: Team-building with a touch of health and energy!
ready-set-blend.heroDescription: Perfect for corporate evenings, festive events, conferences, wellness challenges, and fun fundraisers!

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This package transforms smoothie-making into a friendly competition! With two blender bikes, speed monitors, and a real-time scoreboard, your participants will experience a unique and motivating team-building experience.
includes: Energetic host to encourage the crowd
75-150 smoothies prepared with your own energy
Ranking system and prizes for winners

options.title: Premium Team-Building Option
options.idealFor: Ideal for corporate events with 40-60 people.

defi-parent-enfant.title: Parent-Child Challenge
defi-parent-enfant.tagline: A family challenge they won't forget!
defi-parent-enfant.heroDescription: Perfect for schools, festivals, family parties, or neighborhood events that want to bring generations together.

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: This unique package combines a child-adapted bike and an adult bike, creating an intergenerational experience where parents and children collaborate in a friendly competition full of laughter and bonding.
includes: Moments of bonding, laughter, and delicious smoothies in one event!

options.title: Bonding Option
options.idealFor: Perfect for small family events and intimate celebrations.

options.title: Family Festival Option
includes: 3 hours of family energy and fun
options.idealFor: Ideal for family festivals and large community events.

la-smoothie-parade.title: The Smoothie Parade
la-smoothie-parade.tagline: The ultimate experience for large events!
la-smoothie-parade.heroDescription: This festive package includes 2 large blender bikes and 1 small one (for children 6 years and older), perfect for events that call for excitement, colors, and community.

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: Our most spectacular package! With three blender bikes, this setup creates a true attraction that captivates and engages crowds for hours. Perfect for large-scale events that want to make a lasting impression.

options.title: Festival Option
options.idealFor: Perfect for medium festivals and community events.

options.title: Premium Show Option
options.idealFor: Ideal for large corporate events and major activations.

options.title: Mega-Event Option
options.idealFor: Perfect for mega-events and festivals of national scale.

signature.title: Signature Package
signature.heroDescription: Make your event unique with our Signature event branding package. Premium solution with complete customization for high-end brand activations.

mainSection.title: What's included?
mainSection.description: Our most exclusive package, fully customizable according to your exact needs. From design to execution, we create a unique experience that perfectly reflects your brand and objectives.

options.title: Essential Signature
options.idealFor: Perfect for medium corporate events with specific needs.

options.title: Premium Signature
options.idealFor: Ideal for premium brand activations and VIP events.

options.title: Exclusive Signature
options.idealFor: Perfect for exceptional events and national campaigns.

pageHero.title: Our Packages
pageHero.description: Festivals, corporate events, fundraisers, or school programs - we have the perfect package for you. Discover our smoothie bike offerings.

intro.description1: Our smoothie bikes are available for rental throughout the region. Whether you're organizing a small family event or a large festival, we have a solution tailored to your needs.
intro.description2: All our packages include delivery, setup, and teardown, as well as a professional host to guide your guests through the experience. We also provide all fresh ingredients, cups, and other necessary accessories.

packagesGrid.title: Discover our packages
packagesGrid.subtitle: A unique and memorable experience for all types of events

help.title: Need help choosing?
help.description: Our team can help you select the perfect package for your event or create a fully customized solution.

testimonial.text: We booked Voilà Vélo Fruité for our corporate day and it was a resounding success! The team was professional and our employees loved the experience.
testimonial.author: Marie Lemieux

testimonial.text: Our experience with {packageTitle} was absolutely amazing! Our guests loved the interactivity and the smoothies were delicious.
testimonial.author: Isabelle Tremblay
